quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Series and Lonesome Dove
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, drama, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the prostitute who is the object of mens affections in the mini series Lonesome Dove?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Loreena Wood

questions.question: What gift does fictional character Tony Soprano bring to his mother Livia, when he visits her in the Retirement Community?
In the TV series The Sopranos, Christophers first hit takes place in this establishment.
In the mini series Lonesome Dove, before he dies, Gus makes a bizarre request of Call. What is it?

options.text: Not to tell any of the men he died
To give his half of the herd to Lorena
To take his body back to Texas for burial

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To take his body back to Texas for burial

questions.question: What brand is the red car of fictional character Tony Soprano?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chevrolet Suburban

questions.question: Which of these is NOT a reason Spike likes Earth as it is according to season 2 of Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
Who portrayed Woodrow Call in the Lonesome Dove mini series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tommy Lee Jones

questions.question: On the TV drama The Sopranos, Adriana is picked up by the FBI for the following reason.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Accessory in a murder

questions.question: How does Gus die in the Lonesome Dove series?

options.text: He is bitten by a poisonous snake.
He dies from blood poisoning from an untreated arrow wound.
He dies from a bullet wound.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He dies from blood poisoning from an untreated arrow wound.

questions.question: In the TV series The Sopranos, Christopher Multisanti is Tonys nephew.
Who played Augustus McCrae in the mini series Lonesome Dove?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Duvall

questions.question: What was the odd name of the sheriff of Fort Smith, Arkansas in the western series Lonesome Dove?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: July Johnson

questions.question: In the series Lonesome Dove, Gus is revealed to be Newts father.
Where in New Jersey is Tonys mansion according to the TV series The Sopranos?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: North Caldwell

questions.question: What is the name of the boat on which Big Pussy is executed on the TV show The Sopranos?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It has no name.

questions.question: On the TV show The Beverly Hillbillies, Granny always said she grew up in this state.

Who owns the place where Jackson works on the TV show Hannah Montana?
